name: INF-HSEQ CC0375-ITP-007 Open Drains & Checklist - Rev.6

name: Ref docs - Issued drawings / Site copy drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Check that you have the latest site and engineering drawings BEFORE starting each task/set of tasks.
Acceptance Criteria - Lots to be broken up accordingly and outlined on a lot of map
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Submission of Mix Design and compliance certificates for concrete constituents
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 3.0]
Acceptance Criteria - Submission of compliance certificates for joint fillers and sealants, proprietary products, wire mattresses, gabions, rock fill, and geotextile.
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Underlying services and/or assets have been installed prior to commencing works over and/or above.
Acceptance Criteria - Has the set-out alignment been reviewed by the Superintendent?
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.1]
Acceptance Criteria - Excavate to dimensions shown on drawings or where not shown to a depth of 300mm and minimum water way area of 0.2m2
○ Cross section: V-shaped or trapezoidal unless otherwise shown on drawings
○ Batter slope: Not steeper than 2:1 (H: V)
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.1]
Acceptance Criteria - Notify the Superintendent of any unsuitable material and seek direction for removal. Dispose and replace material as directed.
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.1]
Acceptance Criteria - Construct embankment in compacted layers of max. depth 150mm.
○ Revegetate the embankment after completion if necessary
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.1]
Acceptance Criteria - Compact to a density equal to the naturally occurring material or alternatively to 95% standard compaction
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.1]
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure free flow of water and minimum grade of 0.5%. Discharge into natural depressions, culverts or pits
○ Compact any surface to be lined to 90% relative compaction
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.2]
Acceptance Criteria - Unless shown otherwise on the drawings use the following linings:
– Organic fibre mat and vegetation for grades 1-5%
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.2]
Acceptance Criteria - Install as per manufacturer’s instructions
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.2]
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum thickness of 100mm or as per design drawings. Free of humps or irregularities
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.2]
Acceptance Criteria - As per design drawings or at 2m spacing in non-horizontal elements
Ref docs - Spec. 0319 Minor Concrete Works [Cl 4.8, 4.9, 4.10, 4.11] Drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Check docket to ensure strength and slump is as per design requirements
○ Ensure the temperature of freshly mixed concrete is maintained in between 5°C and 35°C. Ensure elapsed time between batching and discharge of the mix complies with the below table.
Concrete temperature at time of discharge (C) || Maximum elapsed time (hours)
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 0319 Minor Concrete Works [Cl 4.2]
Acceptance Criteria - The nominal rate of sampling shall be taken as:
Number of batches for each type and grade of concrete per day || Minimum number of samples
Slump: One per batch of concrete
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance Criteria - Average compressive strength at 28 days meets minimum design requirements
○ Slump within tolerances specified in AS 1379
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -

Acceptance Criteria - Contraction joints to conform to the following:
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.3]
Acceptance Criteria - Expansion joints to conform to the following:
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Shape and compact foundation material to 95% standard compaction
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Place geotextile between the foundation and any wire cages
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Assemble and lace the rock mattress or gabion cage as per manufacturer’s instructions.
○ Secure the end of a new cage to completed works or with galvanised star pickets driven in to the ground.
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Fill boxes whilst under tension and only release tension once fully laced. Ensure cages are fully filled and uniform.
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.5]
Acceptance Criteria - Inspect rock filled mattresses or gabions upon completion
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.6]
Acceptance Criteria - Survey report verifying open drains have been constructed within tolerance:
○ Finish levels of channel/gutter surface: within ± 10mm of design level.
○ Surface deviation of kerb face and channel surface: ±5 mm from edge of a 3m straight edge, except at laybacks, grade changes or curves, or at gully pits requiring channel/gutter depression.
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
4.2 - Acceptance and closure of non-conforming items
Acceptance Criteria - NCRs to be opened for non-conforming items and closed prior to closing construction lot.
